Name: ABSMAG_R

Name: APFLUX_Z

Name: A_MGII

Name: BGS_TARGET

Name: BITWEIGHTS

Name: BLOBDIST

Name: BRICKID

Name: BRICKNAME
Description: Brick name from tractor input

Name: BRICK_OBJID
Description: Imaging Surveys OBJID on that brick

Name: B_MGII
Description: Fitted parameter B (constant) by MgII fitter

Name: CAMERA
Description: Camera identifier. Passband and SPECGRPH ([brz][0-9]).

Name: CHECKER

Name: CHI2
Description: Best fit chi squared

Name: CMX_TARGET
Description: Target selection bitmask for commissioning

Name: COADD_EXPTIME
Description: Summed exposure time for coadd

Name: COADD_FIBERSTATUS

Name: COADD_NUMEXP
Description: Number of exposures in coadd

Name: COADD_NUMNIGHT

Name: COADD_NUMTILE

Name: COEFF

Name: COMP_TILE
Description: Assignment completeness for all targets of this type with the same value for TILES

Name: C_CIII
Description: Confidence for CIII line

Name: C_CIV
Description: Confidence for CIV line

Name: C_Halpha
Description: Confidence for Halpha line

Name: C_Hbeta
Description: Confidence for Hbeta line

Name: C_LYA
Description: Confidence for LyA line, i.e. ~probability to be a QSO

Name: C_MgII
Description: Confidence for MgII line

Name: DCHISQ
Description: Difference in chi-squared between Tractor model fits

Name: DEC

Name: DEC_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of DEC, excluding astrometric calibration errors

Name: DELTACHI2

Name: DELTA_CHI2

Name: DELTA_X

Name: DELTA_Y

Name: DEVICE_LOC

Name: FIBERFLUX_IVAR_Z

Description: fraction of light from point-like source captured by 1.5 arcsec diameter fiber given atmospheric seeing

Name: RA
Description: Barycentric Right Ascension in ICRS

Name: RA_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of RA (no cosine term!), excluding astrometric calibration errors

Name: REF_CAT
Description: Reference catalog source for star: 'T2' for Tycho-2, 'G2' for Gaia DR2, 'L2' for the SGA, empty otherwise

Name: REF_EPOCH
Description: Reference epoch for Gaia/Tycho astrometry. Typically 2015.5 for Gaia

Name: REF_ID
Description: Tyc1*1,000,000+Tyc2*10+Tyc3 for Tycho-2; ``sourceid`` for Gaia DR2

Name: REF_MAG
Description: Magnitude used to calculate ``IN_RADIUS``; typically, in order of preference, G-band for Gaia or VT then HP then BT for Tycho.

Name: RELEASE
Description: Imaging surveys release ID

Name: REST_GMR_0P0
Description: Rest-frame g-r colour at redshift=0.0

Name: REST_GMR_0P1
Description: Rest-frame g-r colour at redshift=0.1

Name: RMS_DELTA_X
Description: RMS (over exposures) of the fiber difference between measured and requested CS5 X location on focal plane

Name: RMS_DELTA_Y
Description: RMS (over exposures) of the fiber difference between measured and requested CS5 Y location on focal plane

Name: ROSETTE_NUMBER
Description: Rosette number ID [0-19]

Name: ROSETTE_R
Description: Radius from the center of the rosette to the target

Name: SCND_TARGET
Description: Target selection bitmask for secondary programs

Name: SCND_ORDER
Description: Number of row for target entry in secondary file (placeholder; needed by fiberassign)

Name: SEEING_ETC
Description: Average FWHM atmospheric seeing during this exposure as measured by ETC

Name: SEEING_GFA
Description: Average FWHM atmospheric seeing during this exposure as measured by GFA

Name: SERSIC
Description: Power-law index for the Sersic profile model (MORPHTYPE='SER')

Name: SERSIC_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of SERSIC

Name: SHAPEDEV_E1
Description: deVaucouleurs shape fit elipticity parameter e1

Name: SHAPEDEV_E1_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of SHAPEDEV_E1

Name: SHAPEDEV_E2
Description: deVaucouleurs shape fit elipticity parameter e2

Name: SHAPEDEV_E2_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of SHAPEDEV_E2

Name: SHAPEDEV_R
Description: deVaucouleurs shape half-light radius

Name: SHAPEDEV_R_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of SHAPEDEV_R

Name: SHAPEEXP_E1
Description: Imaging exponential shape fit elipticity parameter e1

Name: SHAPEEXP_E1_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of SHAPEEXP_E1

Name: SHAPEEXP_E2
Description: Imaging exponential shape fit elipticity parameter e2

Name: SHAPEEXP_E2_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of SHAPEEXP_E2

Name: SHAPEEXP_R
Description: Imaging exponential shape half-light radius

Name: SHAPEEXP_R_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of SHAPEEXP_R

Name: SHAPE_E1
Description: Ellipticity component 1 of galaxy model for galaxy type MORPHTYPE

Name: SHAPE_E1_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of SHAPE_E1

Name: SHAPE_E2
Description: Ellipticity component 2 of galaxy model for galaxy type MORPHTYPE

Name: SHAPE_E2_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of SHAPE_E2

Name: SHAPE_R
Description: Half-light radius of galaxy model (>0)

Name: SHAPE_R_IVAR
Description: Inverse variance of SHAPE_R

Name: SIGMA_MGII
Description: Fitted parameter SIGMA (linewidth) by MgII fitter (in angstrom?)

Name: SPECTRO
Description: Spectrograph number [0-9]

Name: SPECTROID
Description: Hardware ID of spectrograph (not used)

Name: SPECTYPE
Description: Spectral type of Redrock best fit template (e.g. GALAXY, QSO, STAR)

Name: SPGRPVAL
Description: Value by which spectra are grouped for a coadd (e.g. a YEARMMDD night)

Name: STD_FIBER_DEC
Description: Standard deviation (over exposures) of DEC of actual fiber position

Name: STD_FIBER_RA
Description: Standard deviation (over exposures) of RA of actual fiber position

Name: SUBPRIORITY
Description: Random subpriority [0-1) to break assignment ties

Name: SUBTYPE
Description: Spectral subtype

Name: SUM_CALIB_COUNT_B
Description: Sum of calibrated flux in B camera

Name: SUM_CALIB_COUNT_R
Description: Sum of calibrated flux in R camera

Name: SUM_CALIB_COUNT_Z
Description: Sum of calibrated flux in Z camera

Name: SUM_FFLAT_COUNT_B
Description: Sum of fiber-flatfielded counts B camera

Name: SUM_FFLAT_COUNT_R
Description: Sum of fiber-flatfielded counts R camera

Name: SUM_FFLAT_COUNT_Z
Description: Sum of fiber-flatfielded counts Z camera

Name: SUM_RAW_COUNT_B
Description: Sum of raw counts in B camera

Name: SUM_RAW_COUNT_R
Description: Sum of raw counts in R camera

Name: SUM_RAW_COUNT_Z
Description: Sum of raw counts in Z camera

Name: SUM_SKYSUB_COUNT_B
Description: Sum of sky-subtracted counts in B camera

Name: SUM_SKYSUB_COUNT_R
Description: Sum of sky-subtracted counts in R camera

Name: SUM_SKYSUB_COUNT_Z
Description: Sum of sky-subtracted counts in Z camera

Name: SURVEY
Description: Survey name

Name: SV1_BGS_TARGET
Description: BGS (bright time program) target selection bitmask for SV1

Name: SV1_DESI_TARGET
Description: DESI (dark time program) target selection bitmask for SV1

Name: SV1_MWS_TARGET
Description: MWS (bright time program) target selection bitmask for SV1

Name: SV1_SCND_TARGET
Description: Secondary target selection bitmask for SV1

Name: SV2_BGS_TARGET
Description: BGS (bright time program) target selection bitmask for SV2

Name: SV2_DESI_TARGET
Description: DESI (dark time program) target selection bitmask for SV2

Name: SV2_MWS_TARGET
Description: MWS (bright time program) target selection bitmask for SV2

Name: SV2_SCND_TARGET
Description: Secondary target selection bitmask for SV2

Name: SV3_BGS_TARGET
Description: BGS (bright time program) target selection bitmask for SV3

Name: SV3_DESI_TARGET
Description: DESI (dark time program) target selection bitmask for SV3

Name: SV3_MWS_TARGET
Description: MWS (bright time program) target selection bitmask for SV3

Name: SV3_SCND_TARGET
Description: Secondary target selection bitmask for SV3

Name: SV_NSPEC
Description: Number of coadded spectra for this TARGETID in SV (SV1+2+3)

Name: SV_PRIMARY
Description: Boolean flag (True/False) for the primary coadded spectrum in SV (SV1+2+3)

Name: TARGETID
Description: Unique DESI target ID

Name: TARGET_DEC
Description: Barycentric declination in ICRS

Name: TARGET_RA
Description: Barycentric right ascension in ICRS

Name: TARGET_STATE
Description: Combination of target class and its current observational state

Name: TILEDEC
Description: Barycentric declination of tile center in ICRS

Name: TILEID
Description: Unique DESI tile ID

Name: TILELOCID
Description: Is 10000*TILEID+LOCATION

Name: TILELOCIDS
Description: TILELOCIDs that the target was available for, separated by '-'

Name: TILELOCID_ASSIGNED
Description: 0/1 for unassigned/assigned for TILELOCID in question (it could have been assigned to a different target)

Name: TILERA
Description: Barycentric Right Ascension of tile center in ICRS

Name: TILES
Description: TILEIDs of those tile, in string form separated by '-'

Name: TIMESTAMP
Description: UTC/ISO time at which the target state was updated

Name: TOOID
Description: ID for this target assigned by the ``CHECKER``

Name: TOO_PRIO
Description: Either 'HI' for a very-high-priority target or 'LO' for a very-low-priority target

Name: TOO_TYPE
Description: Either "TILE" for a special tile or "FIBER" for a fiber-override ToO

Name: TSNR2_BGS
Description: BGS template (S/N)^2 summed over B,R,Z

Name: TSNR2_BGS_B
Description: BGS B template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_BGS_R
Description: BGS R template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_BGS_Z
Description: BGS Z template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_ELG
Description: ELG template (S/N)^2 summed over B,R,Z

Name: TSNR2_ELG_B
Description: ELG B template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_ELG_R
Description: ELG R template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_ELG_Z
Description: ELG Z template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_GPBBACKUP
Description: template (S/N)^2 for backup targets in guider pass band

Name: TSNR2_GPBBACKUP_B
Description: template (S/N)^2 for backup targets in guider pass band on B

Name: TSNR2_GPBBACKUP_R
Description: template (S/N)^2 for backup targets in guider pass band on R

Name: TSNR2_GPBBACKUP_Z
Description: template (S/N)^2 for backup targets in guider pass band on Z

Name: TSNR2_GPBBRIGHT
Description: template (S/N)^2 for bright targets in guider pass band

Name: TSNR2_GPBBRIGHT_B
Description: template (S/N)^2 for bright targets in guider pass band on B

Name: TSNR2_GPBBRIGHT_R
Description: template (S/N)^2 for bright targets in guider pass band on R

Name: TSNR2_GPBBRIGHT_Z
Description: template (S/N)^2 for bright targets in guider pass band on Z

Name: TSNR2_GPBDARK
Description: template (S/N)^2 for dark targets in guider pass band

Name: TSNR2_GPBDARK_B
Description: template (S/N)^2 for dark targets in guider pass band on B

Name: TSNR2_GPBDARK_R
Description: template (S/N)^2 for dark targets in guider pass band on R

Name: TSNR2_GPBDARK_Z
Description: template (S/N)^2 for dark targets in guider pass band on Z

Name: TSNR2_LRG
Description: LRG template (S/N)^2 summed over B,R,Z

Name: TSNR2_LRG_B
Description: LRG B template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_LRG_R
Description: LRG R template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_LRG_Z
Description: LRG Z template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_LYA
Description: LYA template (S/N)^2 summed over B,R,Z

Name: TSNR2_LYA_B
Description: LYA B template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_LYA_R
Description: LYA R template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_LYA_Z
Description: LYA Z template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_QSO
Description: QSO template (S/N)^2 summed over B,R,Z

Name: TSNR2_QSO_B
Description: QSO B template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_QSO_R
Description: QSO R template (S/N)^2

Name: TSNR2_QSO_Z
Description: QSO Z template (S/N)^2

Name: TYPE
Description: Morphological Model type from Tractor; renamed MORPHTYPE in most files

Name: URAT_ID
Description: ID in the URAT catalog for sources where URAT supplemented missing Gaia astrometric information

Name: URAT_SEP
Description: Separation between URAT and Gaia sources where URAT supplemented missing Gaia astrometric information

Name: VAR_A_MGII
Description: Variance of MgII fit amplitude parameter A

Name: VAR_B_MGII
Description: Variance of MgII fit offset parameter B

Name: VAR_SIGMA_MGII
Description: Variance of MgII fit width parameter sigma

Name: VERSION
Description: Tag of desitarget used to create the target catalog

Name: WEIGHT
Description: The combination of all weights to use

Name: WEIGHT_COMP
Description: 1/FRACZ_TILELOCID

Name: WEIGHT_FKP
Description: 1/(1+NZ*P0), with P0 different for each tracer

Name: WEIGHT_SYS
Description: Correction for fluctuations in projected density with imaging conditions, from random forrest method

Name: WEIGHT_SYSEB
Description: Correction for fluctuations in projected density with imaging conditions, from linear regression method applied to eBOSS

Name: WEIGHT_ZFAIL
Description: Should be all 1 at this point for main survey

Name: WISEMASK_W1
Description: Bitwise mask for WISE W1 data

Name: WISEMASK_W2
Description: Bitwise mask for WISE W2 data

Name: Z
Description: Redshift measured by Redrock

Name: ZCAT_NSPEC
Description: Number of coadded spectra for this TARGETID in this zcatalog

Name: ZCAT_PRIMARY
Description: Boolean flag (True/False) for the primary coadded spectrum in this zcatalog

Name: ZERR
Description: Redshift error from redrock

Name: ZPOSSLOC
Description: True/False whether the location could have been assigned to the given target class

Name: ZTILEID
Description: ID of tile that most recently updated target's state

Name: ZWARN
Description: Redshift warning bitmask from Redrock

Name: ZWARN_MTL
Description: The ZWARN from the zmtl file (contains extra bits)

Name: Z_CIII
Description: Redshift estimated by QuasarNET with CIII line

Name: Z_CIV
Description: Redshift estimated by QuasarNET with CIV line

Name: Z_Halpha
Description: Redshift estimated by QuasarNET with Halpha line

Name: Z_Hbeta
Description: Redshift estimated by QuasarNET with Hbeta line

Name: Z_HP
Description: Redshift from Healpix coadd

Name: Z_LYA
Description: Redshift estimated by QuasarNET with LyA line

Name: Z_MgII
Description: Redshift estimated by QuasarNET with MgII line

Name: Z_QN
Description: Redshift measured by QuasarNET using line with highest confidence

Name: Z_QN_CONF
Description: Redshift confidence from QuasarNET

Name: Z_RR
Description: Redshift collected from redrock file
